titles.title: Auto Loan Limit Adjustment Act
To amend the Home Owners' Loan Act to remove the limitation on investments by Federal savings associations in consumer auto loans.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 11/14/2006--Introduced. Auto Loan Limit Adjustment Act - Amends the Home Owners' Loan Act to permit a federal savings association to invest in, sell, or otherwise deal in auto loans and leases acquired for personal, family, or household purposes.
